chat-listener.cant-dm: %s sorry, but I can't send you a message, you have probably blocked direct messages!
chat-listener.permission-error-description:
The action cannot be performed, I do not have the right permissions!
I need: `%s`
chat-listener.spam: **SPAM detected!** Ignoring commands on this server for 1 minute!

about.description: Introduction of Corgi and information about him
about.embed-description:
Hi I'm Corgi, a Discord bot.
I'm designed for a wide range of functionality from administration, getting stats from games to classic Discord commands!
I used to be maintained by Wake#0001, but now I'm maintained by cybo#0001!

**Website**: [https://corgibot.xyz](https://corgibot.xyz)
**Invite**: [Click me](https://discord.com/api/oauth2/authorize?client_id=860244075138383922&permissions=3220700791&scope=bot)
**Owner**: %s
**Support**: [Click!](https://discord.gg/pR2tj432NS)
about.help: %about - Shows basic information and links for Corgi.

allow-music.command-not-specified: You have to enter a command: **play** / **nowplaying** / **skip** / **stop** / **volume**!
allow-music.description: Allows the specified role to use a specific music command.
allow-music.role-id-number: Role ID must be a number!

archive.archive-only-see: You can only archive channels you can see!
archive.description: Archives the messages and uploads them to hastebin.
archive.no-permissions: I don't have the permissions to read messages! Permission: `MESSAGE_HISTORY`
archive.only-100-messages: Can't generate a log with more than 100 messages because of Discord API limits
archive.provide-amount-lines: You have to enter number of lines! Ex. `%sarchive 10`
archive.sending-log:
Sending the generated log file with %s messages.
**Link**: %s

avatar.description: Gets the profile picture of a user.
avatar.help: %avatar [@nick/user id] - Gets the profile picture of specified user or by their ID
avatar.title: User's avatar

ban.cant-ban-members: I don't have the permissions to ban users! Give me the permission to `BAN_MEMBERS` or `ADMINISTRATOR`
ban.cant-be-banned: %s cannot be banned as they couldn't be found on this server!
ban.description: Bans up to 20 users from this server.
ban.need-to-mention: You have to mention someone first! Ex. `%sban @User
ban.not-enough-permissions-to-ban: You don't have the permissions to ban %s
ban.only-20-members: The maximum number of users that can be banned at once is 20!

bigmoji.invalid-emoji-format: Invalid emoji format! Try it again!
bigmoji.only-server-emoji: You can only use emojis on this server!

changelog.footer: To see older changes, check out the announcements channel in {1}

choose.choose-in-choose: The first option was incorrectly entered. Try it again...
choose.description: Don't know what to choose? Corgi will choose for you!
choose.no-arguments: You must enter more than one option!

color.description: Gets color from a HEX code

disallow-music.command-disallowed:
If the command **%s** was enabled before, it's now disabled.
**Note:** This command will only disable an already enabled command!
If you want to disable a command for a specific role, you must enable the command for every role that has it enable.
disallow-music.command-not-specified: You have to enter a command: **play** / **nowplaying** / **skip** / **stop** / **volume**!
disallow-music.description: Disallows the specified role to use a specific music command
disallow-music.role-id-number: Role ID must be a number!

eight-ball.ask-something: You have to ask a question %s! I can't read minds!
eight-ball.description: Ask if it's a true or not!
eight-ball.outcomes: Yes.;No.;Most likely YES!;Maybe.;Wait, I'll think.. YES!;Probably not;Unlikely..;If you think about it, it's possible!;It's a sure thing.;It's definitely it;Definitely yes;Something tells me, no

emote.description:
This command shows a special ID of the selected emote,
or all emotes in the guild.
emote.help:
%emote <regex|emote> - Info about emote
%emote list - List of all emotes in this guild.
emote.invalid-or-long: Invalid emote or the ID is too long!

giveaway.embed-description: A brief guide on how to create your own giveaways.
giveaway.field-1-description:
`{%}giveaway 30m` - Basic giveaway for 30 minutes.
`{%}giveaway 1h ; FarCry 3` - Giveaway for 1h with FarCry as the prize 3
`{%}giveaway 2h ; Mafia 2 ; 5` - Giveaway for 2h, with Mafia 2 as the prize for 5 users.
`{%}giveaway 1d3h ; Overwatch ; 1 ; ðŸ˜„` - Giveaway with custom emoji (only the default ones work)
`{%}giveaway 4d ; CS:GO ; 3 ; ðŸ˜„ ; #ffffff` - Giveaway with a custom color
giveaway.field-2-description: If there are multiple giveaways running on the server, you can view basic information using the following command: `{%}giveaway list`
giveaway.field-3-description: Deleting a giveaway is really simple, you just have to delete the message sent by Corgi!
giveaway.giveaway-3-minutes: Giveaway can't be shorter than 3 minutes!
giveaway.help:
%giveaway 1h30m ; Discord Nitro ; 2 ; :smile: ; #ffffff

For more detailed help, use `%giveaway`
giveaway.invalid-amount-of-winners: Incorrectly entered number of winners! Try again..
giveaway.invalid-time-format: You entered an invalid time format! Try it like this: `1d` -> for 1 day.

guild-info.description: Displays information about guild the command is executed in.

help.find-all: You can find all commands on https://corgibot.xyz/commands
help.help:
%help - Sends a list of commands to your DMs
%help [command] - Displays information about a command.
help.prefix-for-guild:
Command prefix on %s is %s
You can find more info with %shelp <command>
help.prefix-invalid-guild:
Command prefix is c!
You can find more info with c!help <command>
help.sent-help: I sent the help menu to your DMs!

ignore.description: Command to set to ignore all commands in a channel.
ignore.embed-description:
Disables the use of Corgi commands in this channel.
If you want to cancel ignoring, just type `%signore` again and cancel ignoring.

:one: | %s ignoring this channel!
:two: | To see a list of all ignored channels
ignore.enable-ignoring: You can enable ignoring again using `%signore`
ignore.footer: If you want to cancel the action, don't react. It will cancel itself in 30 seconds!
ignore.ignoring: ðŸ”• | Corgi will now ignore all commands in this channel!
ignore.listening: ðŸ”” | Corgi will now listen to all commands in this channel!

invite.click: [**Click here] if you want to invite me!
invite.help: %invite - Generates an invite link to invite Corgi to your server.
invite.title: Invite me to your server!

kick.cant-be-kicked: %s cannot be kicked as they couldn't be found on this server!
kick.cant-kick-members: I don't have the permissions to ban users! Give me the permission to `KICK_MEMBERS` or `ADMINISTRATOR`
kick.description: Kicks up to 20 users from this server.
kick.need-to-mention: You have to mention someone first! Ex. `%skick @User
kick.not-enough-permissions-to-kick: You don't have the permissions to kick %s
kick.only-20-members: The maximum number of users that can be kicked at once is 20!

language.description: List of all languages Corgi knows.
language.footer: Click a reaction to change the language.
language.title: Language setings

leave.confirmed-description: Corgi will now leave this server! :sob:
leave.description: A command that will make Corgi leave this server, if approved. (Administrators only).
leave.embed-description:
**WARNING**: By confirming the following action, Corgi will leave this server!
Do you really want to perform the following action?

love.error: You have to mention at least one person! Ex. `%love @nick`
love.mention-yourself: I'll tell you a secret, I'm not that dumb! Don't mention yourself, only you know how much you like yourself.
love.p100: This looks like something more interesting..
love.p75: It might work, depends on you..

mc-status.help: %mcstatus - Shows an overview of Mojang API and its status.
mc-status.marked-offline: Some services might be offline since Mojang status says they're offline.

music.max-length: Max length of a song is **%s minutes**!
music.need-to-be-in-same-voice: You have to be in the same voice channel as me!
music.need-to-be-in-voice: You have to be in a voice channel!
music.playlist-limit: Playlist can't have more than **%s songs**!
music.stopped: Queue was cleared and the player was stopped!
music.track-failed:
Something went wrong when playing the song!
Error: **%s**
music.tracks-not-loaded-limit: %s of songs have not been loaded because they exceed the %s minute limit!
music.youtube-unsupported: YouTube is not supported. Use other platforms like Spotify.

music-play.specify-url:
You have to provide URL!
Example: **%splay https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ**

music-stop.description: Completely stops the player and clears the queue.

music-volume.specify-volume:
You have to provide the volume!
Example: **%svolume 32**
music-volume.volume-number: The volume has to be a number!

pin.description: Pins a message or generates a new one to pin.
pin.help: %pin <ID|message> - Pins a message by its ID or generates a new one to pin

ping.already-running: It is currently not possible to detect the ping, as a scan is already in progress. Try again soon!
ping.description: Shows average ping of the bot.

prefix.cannot-three-chars: Can't set a prefix more than 3 characters long!
prefix.corgi-is-beta-prefix: Corgi is currently in BETA! You can't change the prefix!
prefix.cunrrent-prefix-is: The current prefix for this server is `%s`
prefix.description: Custom prefix settings for this server.

purge.cant-delete-14-days: Can't delete messages older than 14 days!
purge.description: Deletes messages from bots, users or everyone.
purge.help:
%purge <number> - Deletes entered number of messages from everyone.
%purge <amount> [@user|regex] - Deletes entered number of messages from the selected user or by text.
purge.no-messages-mentions: You cannot delete selection and the selected text at the same time!
purge.not-found-from-users: No messages were found from the specified users!
purge.rows-higher-than-100: The number of lines must not exceed 100!
purge.rows-lower-than-0: The number of lines must not be less than 1!
purge.rows-not-specified: You must specify the number of lines!

reminder.description:
Do you always forget everything? Set a reminder!
With a single command you can set Corgi to remind you!
Alerts are accurate within 30 seconds!
reminder.help:
%reminder - Shows help
%reminder [time] ; [text] - Reminder settings
%reminder list - Shows all your future reminders
%reminder delete [ID] - Deletes a reminder
reminder.incorrect-command: You missed something! Example: %reminder 2h ; Turn off Corgi!
reminder.invalid-time-format: You entered an invalid time format! Try it like this: `1d` -> for 1 day.
reminder.no-id: You didn't enter an ID. Try it again!
reminder.non-existing-id: Entered ID doesn't exist or this is an internal error!
reminder.too-long-time: Sorry, but notifications longer than 1000 characters cannot be processed! Your requested alert has a length of - {1}

role-info.description: Shows info about a specific role

roles.description: Shows all roles on this server

say.description: You can write as bot with this command.

support.description: Allows you to join a support server for Corgi.
support.embed-description: Use this [**LINK**]({1}) command to join Corgi's support server
support.embed-title: Link to support server for Corgi!

text-to-block.provide-text: You have to provide some text!

twitter.account-already-followed: Twitter account **%s** is already followed in this channel!
twitter.description: Twitter Feed for chosen channels from Twitter.
twitter.embed-description: Twitter Feeds allow you to receive news from your Twitter feed via Corgi. So if Corgi follows someone and they tweet a request, Corgi will send the tweet to Discord as well.
twitter.embed-field-1-description:
**%twitter sub [ID]** - Subscribes to a Twitter in this channel
**%twitter list** - Shows a list of subscribed Twitter accounts
**%twitter unsub [ID]** - Unsubscribes from the selected Twitter account
twitter.embed-field-2-name: Where can I find account ID?
twitter.find-id-on: You can find the user ID on https://tweeterid.com/
twitter.help:
**%twitter sub [ID]** - Subscribes to a Twitter account in this channel
**%twitter list** - Shows a list of subscribed Twitter accounts
**%twitter unsub [ID]** - Unsubscribes from the selected Twitter account

 You can get the account IDs here: https://tweeterid.com/
twitter.id-not-matching: The ID does not match the Twitter format or is not a user ID!
twitter.not-followed-or-not-found: Twitter account isn't followed or couldn't be found!
twitter.succesfully-followed: Successfully started following **%s**. New tweets will show in this channel.

uptime.description: Shows for how long is Corgi online.

userinfo.cant-view: Mentioned user couldn't be found, can't show info about them.
userinfo.description: Shows basic info about a user.
userinfo.help:
%userinfo - Info about yourself
%userinfo @nick - Info about another user
userinfo.user-not-found: Can't find that user on this server!

giveaway.embed-description:
React with %s to participate!
Remaining time: %s
giveaway.no-winner-found: No winner was found, no one participated in the giveaway!

error.api-failed: Wrong API request! Try it again later...
error.cant-add-buttons: Can't add buttons because I don't have the `MESSAGE_HISTORY` permission!
error.command-failed: An error was encountered while performing the command. Try it again later!
error.no-context: Can't send a message without text!
